item.description:
A Night in the Tropics

Don’t Worry, Be Happy!!

Friday, July 16, 6.p.m

Are you ready for more summer fun with The Ira?

We Be Jammin’

: If you can’t get to the Islands, the feel and the flavor of the Islands will come to you.

: A chance to meet an Island Girl or Guy!!

: Colorful and fun Island-wear optional, but encouraged!!! For one night we’ll pretend we’re on a tropical island vacation.

: Dancing with Free Salsa and Marengue lessons

: Door prizes and glowingly fun gifts for all.


What is The Ira talking about, you are wondering?

PLEASE READ BELOW THE EXCITING DETAILS!!!!

The Ira of The Ira’s Singles Events is Co- Hosting a NEW AND EXCITING CONCEPT IN THE SINGLES WORLD: A new monthly singles event that has a different theme each month, and is FUN, ORGINAL, CREATIVE, AND BEST OF ALL, AN OPPORTUNITY TO

FIND A KEEPER!!

Find a Keeper is a singles night for grownups – 40 and over --co-hosted by The Ira-
Of the always-fun and welcoming The Ira’s Single Events. Yes, branching out into Western Massachusetts. A chance to meet and mingle with your next door Massachusetts Singles neighbor….( Yay - for expanding your horizons!!)

Join us to eat, drink, mingle and meet new people – maybe find the person you’ve been looking for. At the very least, you’ll have a great time in a warm and inviting atmosphere -- all with The Ira’s own brand of personal introductions for all.


THE EXCITING DETAILS BELOW:

WHEN: Friday. June 16, 2010. 6:00 p.m. - whenever

COST: $30.00

6:00- 8:00- Tropical Mingling, Eating, the mixing and pouring of your favorite libations

8:00- Dancing with free Salsa and Marengue lessons

WHERE: Delaney House (In the Grand Ballroom) 1 Country Club Road, Holyoke, MA 01040. 413-532-1800

Food Stations with Island fare

Plus- Bartenders to prepare your favorite cocktails. An array of Tropical Drinks will be offered. Cash Bar/Credit Card Bar….Lol.

For tickets, call 413-535-5077 or visit: http://www.logcabin-d...

Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: July 16. A Night in the Tropics
Questions: 860-604-5792. For other exciting Single Events, please see:
www.the irassinglesevents.com
item.how_to_find_us: A Tropical Host or Hostess will direct you to the group
item.name: The Ira- A Night in the Tropics- We Be Jammin'- Meet your Island Girl or Guy!!
